metadata.dcterms:title: Prairie Provinces Historical Postcards - Metadata Records
metadata.dcterms:creator: University of Alberta Libraries
metadata.dcterms:description: This set contains records for 13,472 digitized historical postcards depicting various aspects of life on the Canadian Prairies from the 1890s through the 1950s. Format: MODS XML
metadata.dcterms:subject: postcards
metadata.dcterms:rights: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License.
